def sanitise_headers(filepath, targetpath):

    ### imports
    import pandas as pd 
    import re

    ### opening file
    targetpath += filepath.split(".windows.net/")[1]
    df = pd.read_parquet(targetpath)

    ### reading column names and sanitising for parquet format
    cols = df.columns
    cols=[re.sub("( |\#|\# |\.|\(|\)|\/)","_",i) for i in cols] # replace chars with _
    cols=[re.sub("([\_]{2,})","_",i) for i in cols] #replace consecutive _ with one _
    cols=[re.sub("(\_)$","",i) for i in cols] #remove trailing _
    df.columns = cols

    ### writing file
    df.to_parquet(targetpath)

def mount_parquet_synapsesql(curated_database_name,curated_storage_table_name,curated_storage_folder_path):
    from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
    spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
    from pyspark.sql.types import *

    spark.sql("DROP TABLE {0}.{1}".format(curated_database_name,curated_storage_table_name))
    spark.sql("CREATE TABLE {0}.{1} USING PARQUET LOCATION '{2}' ".format(curated_database_name,curated_storage_table_name,curated_storage_folder_path))
